it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui

Class GuiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.client.view.View
      • it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui.GuiController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GuiController
extends View
    Class GuiController: the class responsible of starting the gui, establish a connection with the server and of the switch of the scene depending on the state of the game. The class extends the abstract class and implements all the generics method to update the view depending on the event received from the server
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
    See Also:
    Runnable
